issue.title: What will be the difference between the Test and the Finals environment?

content.raw:
I [posted this previously](#!/osrf/srcsim/issues/107/what-is-the-structure-of-the-final), but is this an accurate representation of the finals setup?  
![src_structure.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/3942739509-src_structure.png)

I'm most curious about how each team's code will be initialized and executed on the Field Computer side.  

Also, it sounded in previous descriptions like we are not connecting as a remote ROS machine, but are responsible for our own communication protocols.  Is that accurate?
content.html:
I posted this previously, but is this an accurate representation of the finals setup?

I'm most curious about how each team's code will be initialized and executed on the Field Computer side.

Also, it sounded in previous descriptions like we are not connecting as a remote ROS machine, but are responsible for our own communication protocols. Is that accurate?
